name: UpdateAwsScanOptions
description:
Update Agentless scan options for an AWS account.

This tool updates the Agentless scan settings for a specified AWS account. It should be called when modifications to scan options are needed for security or compliance purposes.

parameters.name: aws_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the AWS account for which to update scan options.

value_schema.description: The ID of an AWS account.

parameters.name: account_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the AWS account that needs scan options updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the AWS account.

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type. Must be set to `aws_scan_options`.

value_schema.description: The type of the resource. The value should always be `aws_scan_options`.

parameters.name: enable_lambda_scanning
parameters.description: Set to true to enable scanning of AWS Lambda functions.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning of Lambda functions is enabled.

parameters.name: enable_sensitive_data_scanning
parameters.description: Enable scanning for sensitive data in the AWS account. Set to true to enable.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for sensitive data is enabled.

parameters.name: enable_vulnerability_scanning_for_containers
parameters.description: Set to true to enable scanning for container vulnerabilities.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in containers is enabled.

parameters.name: enable_vulnerability_scanning_in_hosts
parameters.description: Enable scanning for vulnerabilities in hosts. Set to true to enable, false to disable.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in hosts is enabled.
